channel.title: Kerry Ferguson on Transcripts of Iriss.fm

item.title: Gig Buddies
item.description: MM Michael McEwan SM Samuel Magg KF Kerry Ferguson On this episode I went to find out about a project in Scotland called, Gig Buddies, Gig Buddies for like music fans who have a learning disability where volunteers who shares a similar interest so, I went to find out about this kind of work and I went to speak to Kerry Ferguson and Samuel Maggs. MM So, Sam what is Gig Buddies and why is there a need for this project?
